column1: Depending on your symptoms, you may have had one of these types of procedures: - Placing a small rubber band around the hemorrhoids to shrink them by blocking blood flow - Stapling the hemorrhoids to block blood flow - Surgically removing the hemorrhoids - Laser or chemical removal of the hemorrhoids After your recovery from the anesthesia, you will return home the same day.
- Your doctor may also recommend eating a bland diet the first few days after surgery.
- Your doctor may suggest using a stool softener so that it is easier to have bowel movements.
Soaking in a warm bath can also help relieve pain.
